Google砸645億收購Fitbit 進軍穿戴裝置市場
02 Nov 2019, 17:31 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社華盛頓1日綜合外電報導）谷歌（Google）今天同意以21億美元（新台幣645億元）收購穿戴式裝置公司Fitbit，以進軍穿戴式科技市場，以及進一步挑戰蘋果公司（Apple）。
法新社報導，網路搜尋引擎龍頭Google尋求進一步擴大硬體版圖，而與數一數二的頂尖健身追蹤器製造商Fitbit達成此交易。
Fitbit共同創辦人兼執行長帕克（James Park）在雙方的聲明中表示：「我們建立起值得信賴的品牌，支援仰賴我們產品的全球2800多萬活躍用戶，讓他們擁有更健康、更積極的生活。」
「Google是實現我們使命的理想夥伴。」
Google裝置與服務資深副總裁歐斯特羅（Rick Osterloh）說，這樁交易意味「將最棒的硬體、軟體和AI結合在一起」，為市場帶來更多穿戴式裝置。
Google和Fitbit表示，Fitbit的平台仍將保持「跨平台」，會繼續為蘋果iOS和Google Android裝置服務。（譯者：陳昱婷/核稿：劉淑琴）1081102

Google 砸645 billion acquisition of Fitbit to enter the wearable device market
02 Nov 2019, 17:31 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
Google (Google) today agreed to buy wearbit device company Fitbit for $2.1 billion (NT$64.5 billion) to enter the wearable technology market and further challenge Apple.
Agence France-Presse reported that Google, the Internet search engine leader, is seeking to further expand its hardware footprint, and this deal is reached with one of the top fitness tracker manufacturers, Fitbit.
Fitbit co-founder and CEO James Park said in a statement: "We have built a trustworthy brand that supports more than 28 million active users worldwide who rely on our products to make them healthier and more active. ."
"Google is the ideal partner to achieve our mission."
Rick Osterloh, senior vice president of Google devices and services, said the deal meant "to combine the best hardware, software and AI" to bring more wearable devices to the market.
Google and Fitbit said that Fitbit's platform will remain "cross-platform" and will continue to serve Apple's iOS and Google Android devices. (Translator: Chen Yuting / Approved: Liu Shuqin) 1081102
